alert.note: Alert for Braxton; Calhoun; Clay; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas; Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 8:33PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A gusty outflow boundary will impact portions of Calhoun, Kanawha, southern Gilmer, south central Lewis, Braxton, southern Roane, Clay, northwestern Fayette and northeastern Boone Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 831 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty outflow boundary from Charleston northeast to Glenville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Glenville, Sutton, Grantsville, Clay, Jefferson, South Charleston, Dunbar, Montgomery, Chesapeake, Marmet, Belle, Clendenin, Cedar Grove, East Bank, Gassaway, Glasgow, Smithers, Pratt and Pinch. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 1 and 83. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 96 and 110. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 52 and 57. West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 72 and 95. Route 119 between mile markers 73 and 80. Route 19 near mile marker 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Braxton; Calhoun; Clay; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas; Roane
